title: Motley Fool Money: 06.28.2013
description: Our analysts talk GDP growth, Barnes & Noble, and robot roaches.   And we talk about the early business of baseball with Edward Achorn, author of The Summer of Beer and Whiskey.
content:encoded: Our analysts talk GDP growth, Barnes & Noble, and robot roaches.   And we talk about the early business of baseball with Edward Achorn, author of The Summer of Beer and Whiskey.
